name: Website Audit Pro v4.1
description: Professional website audit tool with multi-page crawl, Core Web Vitals, broken link detection, PDF reports, and white-label options.

variants.name: Self-Hosted License
variants.description: Full source code with 6 months support. Deploy on your own server.

variants.name: Agency License
variants.description: Full white-label branding, custom domain, priority support, lifetime updates.

variants.name: Enterprise License
variants.description: Custom features, API access, white-label SaaS mode, dedicated support.

requirements: Google PageSpeed Insights API key (free tier available)

faq.question: How do I deploy this?
faq.answer: Deploy to Vercel in 5 minutes. Just connect your GitHub repository and add environment variables.

faq.question: Can I use this for client work?
faq.answer: Yes! The Agency license allows you to use this for client projects with your own branding.

faq.question: Do I need a server?
faq.answer: Vercel's free tier works great. For high traffic, upgrade to Pro ($20/mo).

faq.question: What's the difference from free tools?
faq.answer: Free tools only check your homepage. This tool crawls up to 20 pages and generates professional PDF reports.

faq.question: Can I resell this?
faq.answer: The Enterprise license includes SaaS mode for white-label resale.
